oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Coins from a campfire pit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These coins were reportedly found near the present day First Lutheran Church in Cleveland, TN. Items are believed to be from a soldiers' campfire pit. Coin from the "Republica Mexicana" has a date of 1843. The US coin has a date of 1834.; The First Lutheran Church is currently located on McIntire Street in Cleveland.
